entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low zero.
